About

StatapMY is a showcase of inspiring and ambitious local Malaysian startup companies that have been successfully launched their product to the masses. Whether it is just an app or web service, StatapMY will document them all in this little site. It's built and curated by @nurfaizfoat.

Submission

Local startups scene is at its best now. So, we accept all submission as long as it follows the instruction on How to Submit section below.

How to Submit

To submit a site suggestion, open an issue or create a pull request. Pull requests will be given higher priority since they are easier to include. Make sure the screenshot is 1000x800 and please double check that everything looks good before submitting. Itâ€™s also a good idea to run the screenshot through an image optimizer like TinyPNG before including it. This will help keep the website fast and the repository small as possible.

About the Site

This site is hugely inspired by Bootstrap Expo, Built with Ember and Beautiful Open. It's built with Jekyll, developed on GitHub, and yes it is hosted on GitHub Pages.
